rules_text:
Draw a card. If you cast this spell from your graveyard, put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a green 0/0 Elemental creature with vigilance and haste. It's still a land.
Flashback {4}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
